#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int countBits(unsigned int n)
{
    unsigned int count = 0;
    while(n)
    {
        count++;
        n >>= 1;
    }
    return count;
}
 
int main()
{
    int t,f=0;
    cin>>t;
    int c=countBits(t);
    while(c-- && t>=0)
    {  
        int p=pow(2,c);
        if(t>=p)
        {
            t-=p;
            f++;
        }
    }
    cout<<f<<endl;
    return 0;
}
